meanings.definition: In a manner that does not take into account the theory of relativity.
meanings.sent1: She calculated the speed of the car nonrelativistically, ignoring any relativistic effects.
meanings.sent2: The scientist analyzed the data nonrelativistically to simplify the calculations.
meanings.sent3: The clock ticked nonrelativistically, completely unaware of the concept of relativity.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked nonrelativistically, firmly rooted in classical physics.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship traveled through space nonrelativistically, as if time stood still.

meanings.definition: Without considering the effects of relativity.
meanings.sent1: The experiment was conducted nonrelativistically to observe the direct impact of gravity.
meanings.sent2: The measurements were taken nonrelativistically to avoid any complications from relativity.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred nonrelativistically, oblivious to the concept of time dilation.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts moved nonrelativistically, unaffected by the bending of spacetime.
meanings.sent5: The pendulum swung back and forth nonrelativistically, following a simple, linear path.
